$interpreted: Yang-Tai: Did you find him? What did he say?
Baa Baa: No... He was nowhere to be found...
Yang-Tai: How could that be... He'd never just...
Astonished Employee: President! Sennosuke is here, he says he has something to discuss with you.
Sennosuke: Long time no see, President Yang-Tai. Striking it rich lately?
Yang-Tai: ...I'm getting by.
Sennosuke: Oh, please~ I heard how you won that big commission from the Alliance. And it just so happens I have a surplus of supplies on my hands.
Sennosuke: Why don't we see if we can come to an arrangement together? This way everybody walks away happy.
Yang-Tai: That sounds wonderful, but no thank you.
Sennosuke: Oh? Think it over. We may have had our misunderstandings, but this is business, after all. Don't let your emotions cloud your judgment.
Yang-Tai: I've thought about it clearly, and you have my answer. Please go back where you came from.
Sennosuke: All right, but don't say I didn't try to help. You know how it'll turn out if you get on the Alliance's bad side.
Baa Baa: President...
Yang-Tai: Don't worry, there's still time. There's always a way. I'll find a way out of this.
: Day by day, the deadline draws nearer...
Yang-Tai: I've tried everywhere... Sennosuke's cornered the entire market...
Panicked Employee: Mr. President, the Alliance have sent their reply!
Yang-Tai: "Dear President Yang-Tai, the Alliance sympathizes with your misfortune."
Yang-Tai: "With regards to this critical matter, however, after much deliberation, the Alliance must regretfully decline your request for an extension to the deadline..."
Yang-Tai: "...We hereby remind you that... should the deadline be missed... the consequences shall be severe... The Kai-Tai Group... will be closed and its assets seized..."
Yang-Tai: I thought Arbiter Maeok would be more understanding... but even she's...
Yang-Tai: Please... leave me a moment. I must be alone to think...
Baa Baa: (The President's really at his wits' end now... If this goes on...)
Baa Baa: If you sell him supplies... Is he still sure to buy them?
Sennosuke: If he doesn't, he'll be penalized by the Alliance, and that'll be the end of him.
Sennosuke: Anyway, if he decides to buy from me, he'll have to use the Group's funds.
Sennosuke: When the time comes, you'll start spreading rumors, and then we'll watch as the others all tear him apart, bwahaha~
Baa Baa: Is all that necessary? What... What good will that do us?
Sennosuke: Hmph, that old fogey's always foiling my plans. I can't even buy out a simple shop without him getting in the way. He has to be dealt with.
Yang-Tai: You go too, Baa Baa.
Baa Baa: (...Do we really have to do the President dirty like that?)
Yang-Tai: Baa Baa?
Baa Baa: Yah?!
Yang-Tai: What is it? What's that look on your face?
Baa Baa: Oh, nothing... I've got an idea that might help us out.
Yang-Tai: ...Mm, you've always been a bright spark. Let's hear it.
Baa Baa: Maybe we'd better just close up the group ourselves and walk away.
Yang-Tai: Have you lost your mind?!
Baa Baa: Listen, you've done all ya can already. Nobody would blame ya for it. There'd be some losses, but at least you'll keep yourself safe.
Baa Baa: (This way Sennosuke'll get his way, and the President will get away unscathed. It's a win-win~)
Yang-Tai: What utter nonsense!!!
Baa Baa: Eh?!
Yang-Tai: ...I... I thought you'd understand, but...
Yang-Tai: Don't let me ever hear you talk of such things.
Baa Baa: But why? It's what'd be best for you.
Yang-Tai: Enough!
Baa Baa: You're always saying to look out for others. Isn't that what this is about?
Yang-Tai: You just don't understand...
Baa Baa: What's got you all ropeable?! I'm just thinking what's best for you!
: Soon the deadline arrives...
Yang-Tai: ...That'll be all. Please take care of it.
Baa Baa: G'dday~ What's up with the President today? I just saw him hurrying away.
Kai-Tai Employee: Oh, uh... Well... I guess I can tell you.
Kai-Tai Employee: The President just asked me to run through our reserve funds with him. Looks like he's off to make a deal with Sennosuke.
Baa Baa: Huh?
Kai-Tai Employee: I guess he's all out of options.
Baa Baa: Hmm... Thanks. I won't keep ya, I'd best be off, too.
Baa Baa: Sennosuke knew exactly how it was all gonna go down... Why did it have to end up like this...
Baa Baa: (...I did everything like Sennosuke told me...)
Baa Baa: (But what's this feeling... I've never felt before...)
Baa Baa: (It's just work... Getting things done and making money... How would anything ever get better otherwise...)
Baa Baa: I get it now! Like the saying goes, be kind to others, and that kindness will come back to you.
Baa Baa: We won't get anywhere if we handle things too rigidly~
Baa Baa: Gosh, no wonder I felt like something was wrong~ Hmm~ Well, better not dwell on it, back to work, back to work~
Baa Baa: Oh, Papa Gu... Eh? Is everybody here?
Papa Gu: Has President Yang-Tai come back?
Baa Baa: Hmm?
Yang-Tai: Ah? What's everyone doing here?
Papa Gu: So, you're back. Answer me this, were you out meeting Sennosuke just now?
Yang-Tai: Uh, I...
Papa Gu: Did you seriously take everyone's money just to buy supplies from that creep?!
Yang-Tai: What?! Wait a minute, where did you hear that from?
Papa Gu: The whole of the Kai-Tai Group's talking about it. Don't try to make excuses.
Baa Baa: Please, wait a tick, the President was only...
Papa Gu: You don't need to defend him, Baa Baa. We want to hear it from him!
Yang-Tai: I... It's true, I went to buy from him.
Papa Gu: Have you gone mad? He's selling at several times the market price! We'll be ruined!
Yang-Tai: I know, but it's the only way we can fulfill our contract with the Alliance.
Papa Gu: We entrusted you with our money, Yang-Tai. We're all glad to be able to help out a few struggling business here and there, but this time—
Papa Gu: You've gone too far!
Yang-Tai: Please, everyone! I understand your concerns, but please believe me.
Yang-Tai: This is all for the victims of the famine, and for the good of our Group, too. I promise, I have everybody's best interests at heart.
Yang-Tai: What's that? A receipt? What's the meaning of this?!
Papa Gu: I'm sorry, President, but we can't all suffer losses along with you. I'm withdrawing my contribution to the Group.
Angry Demihuman Employee: Me too! Give me back my money!
Yang-Tai: Please just hold on a little longer, else we'll be bankrupted! Listen to me...
Papa Gu: Bankrupted? That was always our money in the first place!
Baa Baa: (How did it come to this...)
: Some days later...
Baa Baa: No visitors again today...
Baa Baa: What's this... A letter from the President?
Yang-Tai: Baa Baa, I'm sorry for all that's happened. I shouldn't have lost my temper at you.
Yang-Tai: It's been wonderful to see you grow and mature day by day, for the last two years. But I didn't foresee that you might be stuck in the past.
Baa Baa: ......
Yang-Tai: I know it might be selfish, but I'm all out of options now.
Yang-Tai: If I back out now, not only will the employees of the Group all lose their jobs, but the livelihoods of the rest of the demihumans will be endangered, too.
Baa Baa: ...But what does any of that have to do with you?
Yang-Tai: I've made a decision—I've borrowed credit from Sennosuke so that I can afford to buy his supplies.
Yang-Tai: I know the risks, but I've thought it over, and my friends and I will think of a way to pay him back soon.
Yang-Tai: I'm telling you all this because I don't want you to worry...
Baa Baa: "I don't want to hide anything... from my little girl..."
Baa Baa: ...Why... doesn't he stop now, before it's too late?
Baa Baa: Can't he see how much he's going to lose?

Model.Text: Did you find him? What did he say?
No... He was nowhere to be found...
How could that be... He'd never just...
President! Sennosuke is here, he says he has something to discuss with you.
Long time no see, President Yang-Tai. Striking it rich lately?
...I'm getting by.
Oh, please~ I heard how you won that big commission from the Alliance. And it just so happens I have a surplus of supplies on my hands.
Why don't we see if we can come to an arrangement together? This way everybody walks away happy.
That sounds wonderful, but no thank you.
Oh? Think it over. We may have had our misunderstandings, but this is business, after all. Don't let your emotions cloud your judgment.
I've thought about it clearly, and you have my answer. Please go back where you came from.
All right, but don't say I didn't try to help. You know how it'll turn out if you get on the Alliance's bad side.
President...
Don't worry, there's still time. There's always a way. I'll find a way out of this.
Day by day, the deadline draws nearer...
I've tried everywhere... Sennosuke's cornered the entire market...
Mr. President, the Alliance have sent their reply!
"Dear President Yang-Tai, the Alliance sympathizes with your misfortune."
"With regards to this critical matter, however, after much deliberation, the Alliance must regretfully decline your request for an extension to the deadline..."
"...We hereby remind you that... should the deadline be missed... the consequences shall be severe... The Kai-Tai Group... will be closed and its assets seized..."
I thought Arbiter Maeok would be more understanding... but even she's...
Please... leave me a moment. I must be alone to think...
(The President's really at his wits' end now... If this goes on...)
If you sell him supplies... Is he still sure to buy them?
If he doesn't, he'll be penalized by the Alliance, and that'll be the end of him.
Anyway, if he decides to buy from me, he'll have to use the Group's funds.
When the time comes, you'll start spreading rumors, and then we'll watch as the others all tear him apart, bwahaha~
Is all that necessary? What... What good will that do us?
Hmph, that old fogey's always foiling my plans. I can't even buy out a simple shop without him getting in the way. He has to be dealt with.
You go too, Baa Baa.
(...Do we really have to do the President dirty like that?)
Baa Baa?
Yah?!
What is it? What's that look on your face?
Oh, nothing... I've got an idea that might help us out.
...Mm, you've always been a bright spark. Let's hear it.
Maybe we'd better just close up the group ourselves and walk away.
Have you lost your mind?!
Listen, you've done all ya can already. Nobody would blame ya for it. There'd be some losses, but at least you'll keep yourself safe.
(This way Sennosuke'll get his way, and the President will get away unscathed. It's a win-win~)
What utter nonsense!!!
Eh?!
...I... I thought you'd understand, but...
Don't let me ever hear you talk of such things.
But why? It's what'd be best for you.
Enough!
You're always saying to look out for others. Isn't that what this is about?
You just don't understand...
What's got you all ropeable?! I'm just thinking what's best for you!
Soon the deadline arrives...
...That'll be all. Please take care of it.
G'dday~ What's up with the President today? I just saw him hurrying away.
Oh, uh... Well... I guess I can tell you.
The President just asked me to run through our reserve funds with him. Looks like he's off to make a deal with Sennosuke.
Huh?
I guess he's all out of options.
Hmm... Thanks. I won't keep ya, I'd best be off, too.
Sennosuke knew exactly how it was all gonna go down... Why did it have to end up like this...
(...I did everything like Sennosuke told me...)
(But what's this feeling... I've never felt before...)
(It's just work... Getting things done and making money... How would anything ever get better otherwise...)
I get it now! Like the saying goes, be kind to others, and that kindness will come back to you.
We won't get anywhere if we handle things too rigidly~
Gosh, no wonder I felt like something was wrong~ Hmm~ Well, better not dwell on it, back to work, back to work~
Oh, Papa Gu... Eh? Is everybody here?
Has President Yang-Tai come back?
Hmm?
Ah? What's everyone doing here?
So, you're back. Answer me this, were you out meeting Sennosuke just now?
Uh, I...
Did you seriously take everyone's money just to buy supplies from that creep?!
What?! Wait a minute, where did you hear that from?
The whole of the Kai-Tai Group's talking about it. Don't try to make excuses.
Please, wait a tick, the President was only...
You don't need to defend him, Baa Baa. We want to hear it from him!
I... It's true, I went to buy from him.
Have you gone mad? He's selling at several times the market price! We'll be ruined!
I know, but it's the only way we can fulfill our contract with the Alliance.
We entrusted you with our money, Yang-Tai. We're all glad to be able to help out a few struggling business here and there, but this time—
You've gone too far!
Please, everyone! I understand your concerns, but please believe me.
This is all for the victims of the famine, and for the good of our Group, too. I promise, I have everybody's best interests at heart.
What's that? A receipt? What's the meaning of this?!
I'm sorry, President, but we can't all suffer losses along with you. I'm withdrawing my contribution to the Group.
Me too! Give me back my money!
Please just hold on a little longer, else we'll be bankrupted! Listen to me...
Bankrupted? That was always our money in the first place!
(How did it come to this...)
Some days later...
No visitors again today...
What's this... A letter from the President?
Baa Baa, I'm sorry for all that's happened. I shouldn't have lost my temper at you.
It's been wonderful to see you grow and mature day by day, for the last two years. But I didn't foresee that you might be stuck in the past.
I know it might be selfish, but I'm all out of options now.
If I back out now, not only will the employees of the Group all lose their jobs, but the livelihoods of the rest of the demihumans will be endangered, too.
...But what does any of that have to do with you?
I've made a decision—I've borrowed credit from Sennosuke so that I can afford to buy his supplies.
I know the risks, but I've thought it over, and my friends and I will think of a way to pay him back soon.
I'm telling you all this because I don't want you to worry...
"I don't want to hide anything... from my little girl..."
...Why... doesn't he stop now, before it's too late?
Can't he see how much he's going to lose?

Nobody would blame ya for it. There'd be some losses, but at least you'll keep yourself safe.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_13_003","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(This way Sennosuke'll get his way, and the President will get away unscathed. It's a win-win~)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_14_000","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What utter nonsense!!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_14_001","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Eh?!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_14_002","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...I... I thought you'd understand, but...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_14_003","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Don't let me ever hear you talk of such things.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_14_004","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But why? It's what'd be best for you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_14_005","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Enough!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_14_006","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're always saying to look out for others. Isn't that what this is about?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_14_007","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You just don't understand...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_15_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What's got you all ropeable?! I'm just thinking what's best for you!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_16_000","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"Soon the deadline arrives...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_16_001","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...That'll be all. Please take care of it.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_17_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"G'dday~ What's up with the President today? I just saw him hurrying away.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_17_001","SpeakerName":"Kai-Tai Employee","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3594c3","IconName":"h3594c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh, uh... Well... I guess I can tell you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_17_002","SpeakerName":"Kai-Tai Employee","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3594c3","IconName":"h3594c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The President just asked me to run through our reserve funds with him. Looks like he's off to make a deal with Sennosuke.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_17_003","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Huh?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_17_004","SpeakerName":"Kai-Tai Employee","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3594c3","IconName":"h3594c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I guess he's all out of options.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_17_005","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmm... Thanks. I won't keep ya, I'd best be off, too.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sennosuke knew exactly how it was all gonna go down... Why did it have to end up like this...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(...I did everything like Sennosuke told me...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(But what's this feeling... I've never felt before...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(It's just work... Getting things done and making money... How would anything ever get better otherwise...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I get it now! Like the saying goes, be kind to others, and that kindness will come back to you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We won't get anywhere if we handle things too rigidly~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Gosh, no wonder I felt like something was wrong~ Hmm~ Well, better not dwell on it, back to work, back to work~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh, Papa Gu... Eh? Is everybody here?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Papa Gu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3690c4","IconName":"h3690c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Has President Yang-Tai come back?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_23_002","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmm?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ah? What's everyone doing here?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_24_001","SpeakerName":"Papa Gu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3690c4","IconName":"h3690c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So, you're back. Answer me this, were you out meeting Sennosuke just now?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_24_002","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Uh, I...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_24_003","SpeakerName":"Papa Gu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3690c4","IconName":"h3690c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Did you seriously take everyone's money just to buy supplies from that creep?!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What?! Wait a minute, where did you hear that from?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Papa Gu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3690c4","IconName":"h3690c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The whole of the Kai-Tai Group's talking about it. Don't try to make excuses.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_25_002","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Please, wait a tick, the President was only...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_25_003","SpeakerName":"Papa Gu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3690c4","IconName":"h3690c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You don't need to defend him, Baa Baa. We want to hear it from him!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I... It's true, I went to buy from him.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Papa Gu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3690c4","IconName":"h3690c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Have you gone mad? He's selling at several times the market price! We'll be ruined!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_26_002","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I know, but it's the only way we can fulfill our contract with the Alliance.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Papa Gu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3690c4","IconName":"h3690c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We entrusted you with our money, Yang-Tai. We're all glad to be able to help out a few struggling business here and there, but this time\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Papa Gu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3690c4","IconName":"h3690c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You've gone too far!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_27_002","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Please, everyone! I understand your concerns, but please believe me.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_27_003","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This is all for the victims of the famine, and for the good of our Group, too. I promise, I have everybody's best interests at heart.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What's that? A receipt? What's the meaning of this?!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Papa Gu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3690c4","IconName":"h3690c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm sorry, President, but we can't all suffer losses along with you. I'm withdrawing my contribution to the Group.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_28_002","SpeakerName":"Angry Demihuman Employee","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3470c3","IconName":"h3470c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Me too! Give me back my money!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_28_003","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Please just hold on a little longer, else we'll be bankrupted! Listen to me...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_28_004","SpeakerName":"Papa Gu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3690c4","IconName":"h3690c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Bankrupted? That was always our money in the first place!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(How did it come to this...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_29_001","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"Some days later...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No visitors again today...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What's this... A letter from the President?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Baa Baa, I'm sorry for all that's happened. I shouldn't have lost my temper at you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_32_001","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's been wonderful to see you grow and mature day by day, for the last two years. But I didn't foresee that you might be stuck in the past.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_32_002","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_32_003","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I know it might be selfish, but I'm all out of options now.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_32_004","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If I back out now, not only will the employees of the Group all lose their jobs, but the livelihoods of the rest of the demihumans will be endangered, too.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_32_005","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...But what does any of that have to do with you?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_32_006","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I've made a decision\u2014I've borrowed credit from Sennosuke so that I can afford to buy his supplies.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I know the risks, but I've thought it over, and my friends and I will think of a way to pay him back soon.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3689c4","IconName":"h3689c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm telling you all this because I don't want you to worry...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_33_002","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\"I don't want to hide anything... from my little girl...\"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Why... doesn't he stop now, before it's too late?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_005_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Can't he see how much he's going to lose?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
